comments.body:

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17506?focusedCommentId=17597227) by David Li (lidavidm):*
I'm not really familiar for the Parquet reader, so I was following this more out of interest. If you don't get a reply here, maybe try users@arrow.apache.org? I don't see anything in the [docs](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/cpp/parquet.html#logical-types) about this, it seems the logical type should be set appropriately.
